title: Launch Annual Performance Review Cycle
description: An HR administrator needs to launch the annual performance review cycle for the entire company.

tasks.description: Generate the performance review forms for all eligible employees in the performance management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin successfully creates review forms for all active employees.

tasks.description: Send a company-wide communication announcing the start of the review cycle and the deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin drafts and sends the announcement email.

tasks.description: Monitor the completion status of self-assessments and manager reviews via a dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin checks the dashboard to track progress against deadlines.
